title: ESA sets launch date for Ariane 6 for summer of 2024
summary: The long-awaited maiden flight of Ariane 6 is scheduled to take place between June 15 and July 31, 2024, European Space Agency (ESA) Director General Josef Aschbacher announced at a press conference on Thursday.

title: Amazon buys SpaceX rocket launches for Kuiper satellite internet project
summary: Amazon bought three rocket launches from SpaceX for its Project Kuiper internet satellites, the tech giant announced on Friday.

title: SpaceX To Launch Amazon Project Kuiper Satellites In 2025
summary: Amazon has inked a deal with SpaceX for three Falcon 9 launches with the missions scheduled to commence in mid-2025.

title: How to stop Europe’s space sector from lagging behind in defense
summary: Europe has power, influence and a huge economy — so why is it lagging behind in defense?

title: GAO report warns Artemis 3 landing may be delayed to 2027
summary: The first crewed landing of NASA’s Artemis lunar exploration effort is unlikely to happen before 2027, a report by the Government Accountability Office concluded.
